1: <pb/>Pa tak ri k'ij ri' xkaj ri Ezequiy che jun nimalaj yabil, are c'u ri Isaiy ri u c'ojol ri Amoz, xbe che rilic, xubij c'u che: “Cubij ri Ajawaxel: ‘Chabij canok jas ri cawaj cabij can chque ri e c'o pa ri awachoch, catcäm c'ut, man catcunataj taj.’ ”
2: <pb/>Ri Ezequiy xutzolk'omij ri u palaj cho ri xan, xch'aw ruc' ri Ajawaxel, jewa' xubij:
3: <pb/>“Quinta' tok'ob che la Ajawaxel, chi chnataj che la chi sibalaj jic nu banom che patanixic la xukuje' ruc' ronojel wanima', xinban c'u ri cäkaj chwäch la.” Xuq'uis c'u rib che ok'ej.
5: <pb/>chi cäbec cubij che ri Ezequiy: “Ri Ajawaxel ri u Dios ri a mam David, cubij: ‘Ri in xinta' ri a bochi'nic xukuje' xinwil ri u wa'l a wäch. Quinya' chi c'u na olajuj junab a c'aslemal.
6: <pb/>“Ri at xukuje' ri Jerusalen quixinwesaj na pa u k'ab ri ajawinel re Asiriy. Ri in quinchajij na we tinimit ri'.’ ”
21: <pb/><f>[16]</f>Ri Isaiy xtakanic chi cheyok' quieb oxib higo re cäcoj che ri c'ax ri c'o che ri ajawinel, xcunataj c'u ri ajawinel.
22: <pb/>Ri Ezequiy xuc'ot c'ut u chi' ri Isaiy: “¿Rumal jachique etal quinwetamaj chi ri Ajawaxel qui nu cunaj, xukuje' chi pa oxib k'ij quincuinic quinbe chupam ri rachoch ri Ajawaxel?” <pb/>Ri Isaiy xubij che: “Are' etal wa' cuc'ut ri Ajawaxel chawäch che u c'utic chi kas cubano jas ri xubij: <pb/>Pa ri u retabal k'ij ri Acaz, quinban na chi cätzelej lajuj juch' ri u mu'jal ri k'ij chrij.” <pb/>Xtzelej c'u ri u mu'jal ri k'ij chrij, c'ä pa ri lajuj juch' ri u yo'm chi canok. <pb/>Aretak ri Ezequiy ri ajawinel aj Juda xutzir che ri u yabilal, xusuc'umaj we bix ri': <pb/><t>In xinchomaj chi aretak sibalaj utz</t> <t>u banom ri nu c'aslemal</t> <t>rajawaxic quinbe na;</t> <t>xya' takanic chwe chi quinbe</t> <t>jawije' e c'o wi ri cäminakib</t> <t>pune' c'ä c'o na ri nu c'aslemal.</t> <t>In xinchomaj chi man quinwil ta</t> <t>chi u wäch ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>cho we uwächulew ri',</t> <t>man quinwil ta chi u wäch</t> <t>jachin jun chque</t> <t>ri e c'o cho ri uwächulew.</t> <t>Cäyojix ri wachoch, quesax chwe,</t> <t>jacha' ri cäban</t> <t>chque ri qui lic'om cäbal</t> <t>ri ajyuk'ab.</t> <t>Ri nu c'aslemal canok</t> <t>junam ruc' ri u quem jun ajquem,</t> <t>ri cäkopix pa ri quemabal.</t> <t>Chi pa k'ij chi chak'ab banom la</t> <t>chwe chi quinrik c'ax.</t> <t>Ronojel ri jun ak'ab quinrak nu chi'</t> <t>je ta ne chi jun coj</t> <t>cätajin quebuwak ri nu bakil.</t> <t>Chi pa k'ij chi chak'ab</t> <t>nu rikom c'ax umal la.</t> <t>Xak alicha' quinjilowic</t> <t>jacha' ri cäquiban ri xipicar,</t> <t>quinch'ikowic</t> <t>jacha' ri caquiban ri palomax.</t> <t>Ri nu bak'wäch quecos</t> <t>che ri ca'yem chicaj.</t> <t>Ajawaxel,</t> <t>nu rikom c'ax, chux la to'l wech.</t> <t>¿Jas ta c'u ri quincuin ta</t> <t>che u bixic che</t> <t>we ri are' are xbanowic?</t> <t>Man coc ta chi ri nu waram</t> <t>rumal ri u c'axc'ol ri nu c'aslemal.</t> <t>Ri quechajix</t> <t>rumal ri Ajawaxel quec'asi' na,</t> <t>quinc'asi' c'u na in cuc' conojel wa'. <pb/>Ri lal yo'm la rutzil nu wäch,</t> <t>tzelej chi la jumul ri nu c'aslemal.</t> <t>Chilampe' la,</t> <t>che u q'uexwäch ri c'axc'ol,</t> <t>camic c'o jamaril wuc'.</t> <t>Ri lal xto' la ri nu c'aslemal</t> <t>chuwäch ri jul re sachbal wächaj,</t> <t>rumal rech chi e cuyum c'u la</t> <t>conojel ri nu mac.</t> <t>Ri e c'o pa ri mukubal,</t> <t>man quecuin ta quek'ijilan che la,</t> <t>ri cäminakib man quecuin ta cäquiya'</t> <t>juluwem chech la,</t> <t>ri quekaj pa ri jul</t> <t>man quecuin ta cäqueyej</t> <t>ri jiquil la.</t> <t>Xuwi ri e c'asc'oj</t> <t>quecuinic quek'ijilan che la</t> <t>jacha' ri quinban in camic.</t> <t>Ri tataxelab cäquitzijoj na</t> <t>chque ri calc'ual ri jiquil la.</t> <t>Ri Ajawaxel c'o waral che nu to'ic.</t> <t>Ka k'ojomaj ri ka arp chujbixon c'ut</t> <t>conojel ri k'ij re ri ka c'aslemal</t> <t>chupam ri rachoch ri Ajawaxel.</t>
